description:
Fourth is the world's largest and fastest-growing global leader of end-to-end restaurant and hospitality management technology solutions. We pride ourselves on delivering a world-class SaaS experience for our clients by building long term partnerships starting from the first phone call. We know our recipe for success at Fourth is our amazing team... and that starts with hiring the right people!

Interested in joining our smart, fun, and talented team?

We are looking to hire a Vice President of Sales to join our team at Fourth! This individual will oversee our LMM sales team in North America. Responsibilities include setting team objectives, leveraging data to establish market targets, measuring sales performance, and directing resources to achieve revenue goals. This role will report directly to the Chief Revenue Officer

The Role. . .
• Lead and coach the US LMM Markets sales team and create solutions that deliver a high-performing work environment and successful revenue outcomes
• Train, coach, and develop the reps; provide them the necessary tools to get the most from their territories/accounts;
• Drive the overall go-to-market strategy for core restaurant and adjacent industries; plan and forecast all expenses and investments including overseeing the successful development of the annual sales budget and revenue plan in concert with the CRO Monitor team KPIs and proactively identify the actions that your team members can take to improve each month
• Define job accountabilities, measurements, and performance expectations for the sales staff
• Participate in closing strategic opportunities and manage key ongoing customer relationships;
• Key metrics or KPIs for this role include -- profitable sales growth, operational productivity, sales expense management, and staffing/organizational development.
• Analyze team performance data to suggest scalable improvements to core sales processes

The Ideal Candidate. . .
• 5+ years of sales leadership experience in software sales or business development (payroll/peo experience welcomed!)
• Experience with a consultative value-based sales approach selling similar SaaS/Cloud solutions, preferably in Hospitality
• Demonstrated leadership, team management, and employee development skills; this leader will hire, develop, and engage A-players
• Proven success with revenue scaling and team building within hyper-growth environments
• Strong background in implementing modern sales best practices and ability to plan and manage at both the strategic and operational levels
• Experience using SFDC and reporting and tracking key metrics through key CRM and sales productivity tools, ideally implementing MEDDICC methodology

Fourth Perks: Unlimited PTO, Health, Dental, Vision, 401K match, Charity Days, Parental Leave, Flexible Work Environment, just to name a few...

Remote employment limited to: AZ, CA, CO, CT, FL, GA, ID, IL, IN, KY, LA, MA, MD, ME, MI, MN, MS, NC, NE, NJ, NM, NY, OH, OK, OR, PA, SC, TN, TX, UT, VA, & WA

Our Story
In July 2019 Fourth joined forces with HotSchedules to become the global leader in end-to-end restaurant and hospitality management technology solutions. Together, the merged company now represents the world's largest and only provider of end-to-end restaurant and hospitality management solutions for customers across the globe and of all sizes-from a single location or franchisee restaurant to a global restaurant or hotel chain. The combined company's complete software-as-service (SaaS) solution suite including scheduling, time & attendance, applicant tracking, training, inventory management / procurement, HR / benefits and payroll services now serves customers in 120,000 locations worldwide and is supported by a dedicated, unified team across offices in the US, UK, Bulgaria, China, Australia, and UAE.

Fourth is an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration without discrimination because of sex, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, marital status, race, color, age, national origin, military status, religion, or disability or any other legally protected status.

Apply for this job
